錄.definition: diary; record; to hit; to copy

錄供.definition: to take down a confession; Taiwan pr. [lu4gong1]

錄像.definition: to videotape; to videorecord; video recording; CL:盤|盘[pan2]

錄取.definition: to accept an applicant (prospective student, employee etc) who passes an entrance exam; to admit (a student); to hire (a job candidate)

錄屏.definition: (computing) to make a screen capture video; a screen video

錄影機.definition: camcorder; video recorder; videocassette recorder (Tw); CL:臺|台[tai2]

錄用.definition: to hire (an employee); to accept (a manuscript) for publication

錄相.definition: variant of 錄像|录像[lu4 xiang4]

錄象.definition: variant of 錄像|录像[lu4 xiang4]

錄音.definition: to record (sound); sound recording; CL:個|个[ge4]

錄音機.definition: (tape) recording machine; tape recorder; CL:臺|台[tai2]
